Texts.Eng: I've got the fuel I need! I can ^green;load it into the ship at the ships ^orange;fuel gauge. ^white;Then use the navigator to take me to another nearby star system.

To fuel an FTL drive you need Liquid Erchius. This pink liquid ^green;can be found in ^orange;pools underground^green; on ^orange;airless planets^white;. I should pick up at least ^orange;20 units of Liquid Erchius ^white;to fuel my ship. It should enable me to travel to a nearby system.
